readingMnemonic: The plate starts to get so <kanji>warm</kanji> that you could fry an <reading>on</reading>ion (おん) on it. Who doesn’t love fried onions? That plate sure is warm enough, so start cookin’ ‘em!
meaningMnemonic: After a <radical>tsunami</radical>, any <radical>plate</radical> left out in the <radical>sun</radical> will be sure to get <kanji>warm</kanji>. The tsunami knocked this plate out of the kitchen, and now it’s just sitting outside in the sun. The sun heats things, so the plate is getting really warm.
